summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault crypto trading platform. Backend APIs working well, frontend mostly functional with gold theme implemented. Critical trading page JavaScript error found.

configuration_issues.issue: Health endpoint not accessible via public URL - returns frontend HTML instead of API response
configuration_issues.details: Health endpoint defined at app level but Kubernetes ingress routes all non-/api requests to frontend

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: 'chart.addAreaSeries is not a function'
ui_bugs.details: Trading page shows error screen instead of trading interface. Charting library integration broken.

integration_issues.issue: Trading pair selector not found, only 2 form elements detected instead of full trading interface

passed_tests: Homepage loads with gold/orange theme (147 gold elements found)
GET /api/crypto returns cryptocurrency list with live prices
Markets page displays real crypto prices (BTC: $95,305, ETH: $3,323, etc.)
Auth signup/login forms working with proper validation
Protected endpoints properly secured (401 for unauthorized)
User signup API creates accounts successfully
Frontend responsive design and gold color scheme implemented

success_percentage.backend: 75% - Core APIs working, health endpoint routing issue
success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Most pages working, critical trading page error

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical JavaScript error on trading page: 'chart.addAreaSeries is not a function'. This is breaking the core trading functionality. Also investigate health endpoint routing through Kubernetes ingress.
